• A turtle ecosystem simulation where turtles exhibit behaviors like seeking food, wandering, and interacting with environment elements.
  • Grid-based terrain system with configurable cell types including walls, water, grass and sand, editable via painting interface.
  • Customizable settings panel for adjusting turtle personalities, population density, speed parameters, and visual effects.
    grid[gx][gy ACTION_WIDTH val;
    this.state = 'SEEK';

This interactive turtle ecosystem allows users to create and modify environments using a grid-based terrain editor. Turtles autonomously navigate while pursuing food based on personality-driven behaviors like caution or aggression. The simulation includes features like lilypads for resting turtles, obstacle avoidance, and real-time performance statistics tracking.
